summary: Don\\\'t want to be the center of the game? Want to live a normal town folk live? This is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml:
This mod is currently in development! Not publicly released at the moment.

Want to know about it anyways?

Features:
Citizenship in Any of the Holds of Skyrim
Taxes (Once per week an NPC will go around collecting a small tax) [Considering Sales Tax]
Occupations (1 or 2 Unique for Each Hold, At least 6 default.)
Occupation Progression (i.e. Hunter starts working for Drunken Huntsman, proceeds to buy merchant stall Drunken Huntsman owns, Buys out the Drunken Huntsman, Hires an employee.)
Occupation Quests 
Occupation Shipment Orders (A courier will bring you an order from a different town asking for a large amount of *random* item and give you a week to send them out. Hire a courier for shipment, or send employee.)

Much More!
author: Fishagon
